embeds.description:
# Choose a Background
### Folk Hero
You come from a humble social rank, but you are destined for so much more. Already the people of your home village regard you as their champion, and your destiny calls you to stand against the tyrants andmonsters that threaten the common folk everywhere.

fields.name: • Tool Proficiencies
fields.value: One type of artisan's tools, vehicles (land)

fields.name: • Equipment
fields.value: A set of artisan's tools (one of your choice), a shovel, an iron pot, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp
